ygData.subject: Sit-in schedule
ygData.msgSnippet: Since it seemed no one was wanting to take the bull by the horns and get this thing rolling, I tossed this post up at the Concert Hall: Okay, how s this...
ygData.messageBody:
Since it seemed no one was wanting to take the bull by the horns and get this thing rolling, I tossed this post up at the Concert Hall:


Okay, how's this...
Saturday evenings from 9PM CST til whenever you feel like leaving?
Although the idea of holding it in Kelethin (for the size of the zone) was bandied about, I am still in favor going from the gates of Qeynos to the campfire at the Surefall Glade entrance.
Why? Glad you asked
A. Fewer folks than in Kelethin (at least on The Rathe)
B. With the fewer folks, a lot of the other folks in the two zones we were in NOTICED the large number of bards (anything over 3) when doing /who.
C. Less wandering MOBs to deal with.
D. Can see farther
E. No "E", but I just couldn't resist

To give enough time for the news sites to get the info and post it (not to mention word-of-mouth), how about starting things off on the first server (alphabeticly) not this Saturday, but the next one?


-=B=-
Currently On Strike
The Rathe



Opinions, thoughts, hopes, dreams?


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
